text:
Hey guys, I got one! I got a VB!
The game is not half bad actually. The music sounds this good (which leads me to ask, where did you get the rip from?).

PS: The "headaches and eyestrain" thing is bullshit. Bullshit, I tell you.
author: SpiralPegasus

text: While writing a paper on Gunpei Yokoi, I found out that apparently the only reason that they put that on there was for legal reasons. The VB didn't cause eye strain in the vast majority of people, but it had to be there for the minority that could be affected by it.
